name: Tonya Hofmann

jv_history.source_quote:
a Hofmann

Co-founder & CEO of BeeKonnected | Connecting You

what_you_do: Tonya Hofmann is CEO and Co-Founder of BeeKonnected, a relationship-based platform connecting professionals for collaboration, and an international speaker focused on networking, business development, and growing businesses through connections.
who_you_serve: Business professionals, entrepreneurs, speakers, and high-achieving individuals looking to grow their networks, income streams, and careers.
offering: Speaking engagements, workshops, and presentations on networking, communication, business development, and inclusion initiatives; access to BeeKonnected platform for professional collaboration.
social_proof: Best-selling international author of 7 books, featured on cover of 5 magazines, Winner of EBC's Global Mentorship Award, winner of numerous international and national association awards, 13K Instagram followers, globally sought-after speaker.
signature_programs: Change the World from the Front of the Room!, Inclusion Initiatives = Retention Rates, Communication Skills that will Fast Track YOUR Career!, BeeKonnected platform
business_focus: Growing businesses through relationship-based networking and professional connections via the BeeKonnected platform and speaking engagements.
service_provided: speaking engagements, workshops, networking platform (BeeKonnected), business development consulting, membership organization
